short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Rate My Professors ratings directly in your course explorer!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that displays information from Rate My Professors for teachers using tooltips in UBC's course explorer.

This extension is fast and up-to-date, as it uses the Rate My Professors' API.

Supported schools:
    â€¢ University of British Columbia (Vancouver & Okanagan)
